title: Is it possible to send a message via the Internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: How to send texts online 1 Go to opentextingonline.com. 2 Choose a destination country. 3 Enter the phone number. 4 If you wish to receive replies to your text message by email, please enter your email address. 5 Type your text message. 6 Send a text or MMS or both. 7 Wait for reply. 8. Rinse and repeat.
Yes, technically you just did. There are also mobile applications such as WhatsApp and Viber which user an Internet connection to send a message from one phone to another. So yes, it’s very possible.
